connect20/shopa_shareandearn.name: connect20/Shopa_ShareAndEarn

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/shopa_shareandearn.description: Adding shopa and its ‘share & earn’ tools to your retail site allows you to financially incentivize users to recommend your products to their networks and friends.
